Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the type A lantibiotic family (Class I bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli, Moraxella catarrhalis.Yeast:Candida albicans.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: It inhibits cell wall synthesis of Gram-positive bacteria, including Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA).

Literature.Title: A novel lantibiotic acting on bacterial cell wall synthesis produced by the uncommon actinomycete Planomonospora sp.
Literature.Author: Castiglione F, Cavaletti L, Losi D, Lazzarini A, Carrano L, Feroggio M, Ciciliato I, Corti E, Candiani G, Marinelli F, Selva E.
